txt.en:
'[placeholder], while I am most concerned with provisioning and outfitting our visitors, I am troubled by something else. The lynx which dwell upon the High Moor have become feral -- no doubt due to the shadow rising in the East. Unfortunately, they pose a great threat to those who journey to Rivendell seeking refuge.

'However, there may be another possible cause that I would have you investigate. Stinging sickle-flies have begun to come up from the riverbanks, bringing the threat of disease...but their incessant stinging might also be a cause for the lynx' aggression.

'Perhaps if the sickle-flies were purged, the lynx might find peace.'
Defeat sickle-flies upon the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated sickle-flies upon the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Alas, there are still too many flies to make an accurate assessment. Thank you for your aid, nonetheless.'
Sickle-flies pervade the High Moor, bringing the threat of disease...and possibly a cause for the lynx' feral behaviour.
Sickle-flies infest the High Moor in the Trollshaws.\n\nCanaddal has asked you to purge the High Moor of sickle-flies.
Canaddal is encamped on the High Moor in the Trollshaws.\n\nYou should return to Canaddal and let him know that you have done as he asked.
